attributes.action: Get Lord Mawhinney off the football league board
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lord Mawhinney has now brought turmoil to Leeds United football club, he does not deserve to be head of the football league or even on the board, after employing a 15 point penalty on Leeds United AFC for know reason of there own.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
